title: State Buffer Memory Layout
content:
64x64 RGBA state sheet = 16384 bytes.
Blocks:
- Header: 0-63
- Global Regs: 64-511
- Entity Pool: 512-12287
- Audio/FX: 12288-16383

Encoding:
- Int8 in R
- Int16 in R,G
- Int24 in R,G,B

title: Bake Pipeline
content:
Bake runs on load/editor changes:
1) Asset fetch (.mzk + .msc)
2) Parse .msc into AST
3) Extract collision polygons via marching squares (+ simplification)
4) Extract colored paths and build bezier cache

title: Runtime Tick
content:
Per frame tick:
1) Poll keyboard/gamepad to action map
2) Physics broad + narrow phase
3) Dispatch AST events
4) Produce next state buffer
5) Render to WebGL and advance sequencer

title: Pixel Editor Guide
content:
Core tools:
- Color picker + palettes
- Brush size, eraser
- Undo/Redo/Clear
- Zoom and grid overlays
- Debug overlays (collision/path, points/IDs)

Tips:
- Right click for eyedropper
- Alt+Click to select nearest debug layer

title: Config Editor Guide
content:
Edit config JSON in-app using Edit Config mode.
Reload Config applies changes instantly.
Main options:
- game.newRomWidth/newRomHeight/newRomColor
- game.autoCreateOnStart
- game.autoLoadSrc
- editor.defaultPixelColor/defaultScript
- editor.showScriptEditor/showPixelEditor

title: Roadmap Snapshot
content:
Phase 1: Memory + Loader
Phase 2: Lexer + AST compiler
Phase 3: Baking geometry/path/audio caches
Phase 4: Pure loop + renderer integration
Phase 5: Studio UX + hot reload + inspector
